text: Serri (Sèrri) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 653 people lived there. Its area is 19.18 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 640 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Serri
